reviews.review_msg: Dont get Y ppl say he is a sweet guy.Emailed him a couple times inquiring course material.Yes,he would reply u fast but in a COCKY way.I find dis class VERY BORING.He read da lecture notes as if readin a book.He got da weirdest musical taste ever,he like weird sounds.WILL NEVER TAKE ANOTHER CLASS W/ HIM AGAIN..W/ SUCH RUDE ATTITUDE 2WARD STUDENTS.
